rooms.name: Standard Room
rooms.description: Comfortable and modern room with all essential amenities for a pleasant stay. Features contemporary furnishings, premium bedding, and a view of our beautiful hotel gardens.

rooms.name: Deluxe Room
rooms.description: Spacious room with premium amenities and stunning city views. Enhanced with luxury finishes, a comfortable seating area, and upgraded bathroom amenities.

rooms.name: Garden View Room
rooms.description: Peaceful room overlooking our beautiful hotel gardens. Perfect for guests seeking tranquility with modern comforts and a private balcony.

rooms.name: Executive Suite
rooms.description: Luxurious suite with separate living area, ocean views, and premium amenities. Features a fully equipped kitchenette, spacious balcony, and elegant furnishings.

rooms.name: Presidential Suite
rooms.description: The ultimate luxury experience with panoramic ocean views and personalized service. Features a private jacuzzi, premium bar, dedicated butler service, and the finest amenities.

rooms.name: Business Room
rooms.description: Designed for the modern business traveler with a dedicated workspace, high-speed internet, and easy access to our business center facilities.
